title: 119th Problem 2016
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/IyALVwktBR-parallel-circuit.jpg?width=1200"}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Given the parallel circuit above with the following values:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" { R }_{ 1 }=100\Omega \\ \\ { R }_{ 2 }=300\Omega \\ \\ { R }_{ 3 }=600\Omega \\ \\ { V }_{ T }=150V "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"  { P }_{ 2 } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (Power) of the circuit."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Part One."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Check out the set: 2016 Problems."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is part seven of a problem."}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I. Start with the famous identity "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"e^{iπ}=-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"II. So, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"e^π=(-1)^{1/i}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"III. So, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"e^{π/i}=(-1)^{(1/i) \times (1/i)}=(-1)^{-1}=-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"IV. So, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"e^{π/i}=e^{iπ}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"V. So, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"π/i=iπ"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i^2=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"VI. But "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i=\sqrt{-1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i^2=-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". So, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-1=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"In which step is there an error?"}]}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            However the very first error is in step III. because the brackets around -1 are lost!!!

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            how can we transfer the i in step 2???

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

title: 1, 1 and 1
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A=\\underbrace{111\\dots111}_{\\text{Number of 1s = 81}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What is the remainder when "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is divided by 81?"}]}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Since you know that the answer is 0, it's actually simpler to prove that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10^{81}  -1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is divisible by 729 (which is equivalent to proving that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is divisible by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"729/9 = 81"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":")."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Just use binomial expansion:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 10^{81} - 1 = (9+ 1)^{81 } - 1 = 9^3 (\cdots) + (\text{last few terms}) "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What's left to do is to prove that the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\text{last few terms} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is divisible by 729 too.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}
